message.content:
cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.MA, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with the problem of anchor placement in localization-based sensor networks, which is a subfield of networked systems (cs.NI) and control systems (cs.SY). The paper also formulates the problem as a convex optimization problem, which is a common technique in information theory (cs.IT) and machine learning (cs.MA). Finally, the paper discusses the use of the Cram\'er-Rao lower bound (CRB) as a performance constraint, which is a statistical measure commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG).
